review_title: Mommy's Bliss Kids Sleep Chewable (Melatonin + Magnesium, Natural Grape, 35 Chewable Tablets)
review_text:
Size and Packaging

Mommy's Bliss Kids Sleep Chewable tablets come in a convenient bottle containing 35 chewable tablets. The compact size of the bottle makes it easy to store at home or take along while traveling. The child-resistant cap ensures safety, preventing young children from accessing the tablets without supervision.

Scent and Flavor

The tablets have a natural grape flavor that is appealing to children, making it easier for them to take the supplement without fuss. The scent is mild and fruity, which adds to the overall positive experience for kids who might be picky about taste and smell.

Quality and Ingredients

Mommy's Bliss is known for creating high-quality, safe products for children, and this supplement is no exception. The key ingredients in the Kids Sleep Chewable tablets include:

Melatonin: A natural hormone that helps regulate sleep-wake cycles, assisting children in falling asleep more easily.
Magnesium: A mineral that supports relaxation and can help improve sleep quality.
These ingredients are combined in appropriate dosages suitable for children aged 3 years and older, ensuring both safety and effectiveness.

Use and Benefits

These chewable tablets are designed to help children who have difficulty falling asleep or maintaining a consistent sleep schedule. The benefits of Mommy's Bliss Kids Sleep Chewable tablets include:

Improved Sleep Onset: Melatonin helps children fall asleep faster, reducing bedtime struggles.
Enhanced Sleep Quality: Magnesium supports overall relaxation, contributing to a more restful night's sleep.
Natural Ingredients: Free from artificial colors, flavors, and preservatives, making it a healthier choice for kids.
The tablets are easy to chew and swallow, making them suitable even for younger children. Parents can give the recommended dose to their child about 30 minutes before bedtime for best results.

Texture and Application

The chewable tablets have a pleasant texture that dissolves easily in the mouth. This is particularly important for children who may have difficulty swallowing pills. The natural grape flavor ensures that kids will take the supplement willingly, without the need for coercion.

Overall Impression

Mommy's Bliss Kids Sleep Chewable tablets are a reliable and effective solution for parents looking to help their children achieve better sleep. The combination of melatonin and magnesium provides a natural way to support sleep health, without the use of artificial additives. The pleasant grape flavor, ease of use, and high-quality ingredients make this product a standout choice for promoting restful sleep in children.

...if it could be made into a gummy, then possibly 5 stars. My kids tend to be hesitant in taking chewables, though this one isn't bad (not like some of the "tablets" they have had to take for other supplements including magnesium). I like that it does have magnesium in a large amount as well as melatonin AND a herbal blend to round it out. Some gummies in "calming", magnesium or melatonin have such blends BUT are often very expensive AND that is the second problem. When you consider you are only getting 35 chewable tablets, then the price of this is on par with the gummies. So we have been using the gummies more than this (one time purchase) but if you have a young one who prefers chewables, then this may be the better option for you (plus less "sugar" since gummies are often made of such in some form or another).

My child is 3 years of age.  She simply refuse to drink or chew any medication.  She has a very strong will.  Fortunately she is a very healthy child and besides one episode of reflux for about a week or so, we have never struggled with her health in general.  We have always followed a consistent but comfortable routine.   Our child started struggling with falling asleep at night when she was about two and a half years old.  Everyone told me it was the terrible twos but I knew something was off.  Several months of very late nights and I just had to seek help.  Nobody in our family get any proper sleep at night.  Our paediatrician wanted to give her medication to assist with falling asleep but I wanted to try a more natural approach first, especially because we really struggle to get any mediation in.  I tried other natural products but she would simply taste them and not chew them.  As a last resort I ordered Kids Sleep.  From placing the order, to the delivery to the packaging to the use recommendations - all have been very professional.  I was impressed from the start.  My child says it is her night sweets because it taste like her favourite fruit, her words not mine.  The actual pill is small in size so she chews it easily.  We still follow the exact same routine, I just added the sleep supplement right before we brush our teeth.  Thereafter we immediately get into bed, I read to her and we follow our usual bed time routine and 20 minutes after getting into bed, she is fast asleep (this took 2- 3 hours before, literally!).  It started working from the very first time she used the supplement.  This means that we all wake up happier and more rested, including myself.  The entire family is less stressed.  We have only used this product for a couple of days but it has already made the biggest difference in our family life.  Thank you!  I cannot comment on the frequency of use yet, as we have only used it for a couple of days now but I can see that she is settling down nicely so I dont foresee it being necessary to use long term.

Avoiding stress can be key to maintaining physical and mental health. Here are some tips that can help you manage stress: 1. **Regular Physical Activity:** Regular exercise helps reduce stress levels and improve mood. 2. **Nutrition:** A balanced diet can improve your physical and emotional well-being, which will help you fight stress. 3. **Enough Sleep:** Regular sleep plays an important role in reducing stress. Try to get enough hours of sleep each night. 4. **Practice Relaxation:** Learning relaxation techniques such as meditation, yoga, or breathing exercises can help reduce stress levels. 5. **Social Support:** Talk to friends, family, or a professional counselor if you're feeling stressed. The support of loved ones can be extremely helpful. 6. **Time Management:** Plan your time effectively, set priorities and learn to let go of unnecessary commitments. 7. **Take Up Hobbies:** Make time for activities and hobbies that you enjoy. review_title: SENSE OF PRIDE - MOTIVATION TO RESIST TEMPTATION SENSE OF PRIDE - MOTIVATION TO RESIST TEMPTATION
review_text: In one experiment, three groups of people were invited to a room with chocolate cakes in turn. The first group was reminded of the guilt they would experience after eating the cake. The second was asked to think about how proud they would be of their willpower if they could resist the temptation. The third group was not given instructions. And here is the result: those whose pride the experimenters cried out for ate the least of all. Conclusion: Feeling proud is better at resisting temptation than feeling guilty. Shame and guilt absorb the strength needed to fight temptation. Pride, on the other hand, gives energy that feeds the will to resistance. This fact is of some importance in resisting such common human weaknesses as overeating, procrastination, and laziness.

review_title: HOW TO BECOME A HEALTHY PERSON WITH THE HELP OF PROPER SLEEP
review_text: The recipe for becoming a healthy person with the help of proper sleep is simple: You need to go to bed early and get up early. A big mistake is that in the evening people try to finish what they did not have time to do during the day. So they mess around until midnight or later, and in the morning everything starts again. It is much more favorable to go to bed earlier, and then try to get up early in the morning. Then the day will go calmly and measuredly, and you will not need to constantly catch up with time. I strongly urge you not to watch TV before going to bed. You can also not eat at night. Daytime sleep is very unfavorable. An exception is the special need for daytime sleep. For example, when a person is sick or very tired.

review_title: HOW TO BECOME A HEALTHY PERSON: 3 PILLARS OF HUMAN HEALTH
review_text: ‚úîÔ∏è Proper nutrition. Proper nutrition helps to keep the physical body in order. Do not rush to extremes. Each person is completely individual and everyone needs to eat as much as they need. An excess or lack of food will lead to only one result - to constant thoughts about food. How to determine the necessary amount of food for a person? The best way is to get up from the table with a slight feeling of hunger. This is when a person feels that he can eat more, but it is already possible not to eat. In this case, a person will not have any heaviness in the stomach, he will not fall asleep after eating, and he will feel very light. The most favorable order of eating: sweet, then salty and at the end something airy and light. ‚úîÔ∏è Proper sleep. Proper sleep helps keep the mind in order, first of all. There are 5 things that depend on normal sleep: Human happiness (there is no normal sleep - no mood, no happiness); Digestion of food (important processes in the body occur precisely in sleep; therefore, a healthy, normal sleep is necessary); Human strength (with normal sleep there is natural strength); The ability to procreate (it is impaired with bad sleep); Knowledge and ignorance (if a person sleeps a lot or late, he sinks into ignorance). Sleep is a very important factor affecting human health. Unfortunately, so many people are careless about sleep and don't sleep properly. You don't need to force yourself to sleep too little. If you need to sleep, you better sleep. But remember that in matters of sleep, as well as in matters of nutrition, it is better to be a little underslept than a little overslept. The norm of sleep is determined individually. Waking up to an alarm clock is not very good. You need to learn to get up without an alarm clock. ‚úîÔ∏è Ordered sex. Chastity allows us to realize our spiritual nature. Chastity is a careful attitude to sexual (reproductive) energy. The length of a person's life depends greatly on this energy. If a person is very passionate about sex, spending sexual energy, then this will adversely affect health and spiritual well-being. Of course, you can have sex only with your beloved husband or beloved wife. Be moderate in this matter, as well as in matters of nutrition and sleep. Excessive sex addiction is especially dangerous for men ‚Äî they become weak as a result

review_title: HOW TO BE HEALTHY AND HAPPY
review_text: HOW TO BE HEALTHY AND HAPPY ‚úîÔ∏èLearn to say "no". By not saying "no" and giving in when we don't want to do it, we feel resentful. We take offense at those who, as we think, are to blame for the situation; who cornered us so that we could not refuse. We feel victimized. But think about this: to say "no" to another means to say "yes" to yourself. Every time we reject what we don't like, we say "yes" to ourselves - because we ourselves want. ‚úîÔ∏è Think over the rules of family life. In the developed world, family structure has changed dramatically. In families where both work and their elderly parents live separately, when you can buy semi-finished products or eat out, rituals, rules of conduct, and expectations become different. These days, it is not tradition, but chance that decides who is responsible for what and what is required from whom. And many families live like in hell. What to do? Before getting married, the lovers should sit down and, after cold-blooded deliberation, make a written agreement about everything. What values do they share and what assumptions cannot be broken? How many children do they want? Who will be the main breadwinner? Where will they live and what size house do they need? Who washes the dishes, and who manages the family budget? It is necessary to discuss everything openly, so that later no one complains that he is being forced to follow rules that he did not sign up for.

Melatonin is a hormone that helps regulate the body's sleep-wake cycle (circadian rhythm). It is produced in the brain (hypophysis). Melatonin is sometimes called the hormone of darkness because it is released in the evening. Exposure to light inhibits this process. Moreover, light can destroy the melatonin produced. Melatonin affects many functions of the body, such as: ‚Ä¢ blood pressure ‚Ä¢ immunity ‚Ä¢ metabolism ‚Ä¢ digestion ‚Ä¢ bone formation ‚Ä¢ reproductive function In newborns, melatonin is practically absent, it begins to be produced in sufficient quantity before 3 months and continues to grow with age. Most babies establish clear circadian rhythms 6‚Äì18 weeks after birth, and sleep cycles are finally formed by 8‚Äì9 months. If a child's sleep-wake cycle is disturbed, or the pituitary gland does not produce enough melatonin, he may develop insomnia or other sleep disorders. In such cases, it is advisable to take melatonin in the form of a dietary supplement.

Immediately, I note that during pregnancy I did not have a chance to take this complex. I drank another. I bought these vitamins in order to take during breastfeeding. In my opinion, the doses of some vitamins in it are very high. I'm not talking about the vit group. B, their high doses are irrelevant, as they are water-soluble and all excess will be excreted from the body without any consequences. I'm talking about vitamin D and E. The amount of the latter does not greatly exceed the norm, but there is a lot of vitamin D here. I know that there are lovers in everyday life to take vitamins for pregnant and lactating, guided by the fact that they are of a higher quality than usual (as for me this is nonsense, but I often heard this point of view). I definitely do not recommend taking these vitamins to ordinary people without a vitamin D deficiency confirmed by an analysis. Even a pregnant woman herself would be afraid to take it. Of course, at this time, the needs increase ... But, in my opinion, even being in a position, analysis is needed to receive this complex.

review_title: Tasty, but effects vary from person to person
review_text: Verified Purchase I read a review and it said that one tablet works for adults, so I gave half the dose the first time. The 4-year-old ate the other half, but the 3-year-old took less than an hour to fall asleep, and the 4-year-old took 20 minutes. Still, I fell asleep earlier than before taking it, so I wonder if it's effective. Both of us woke up in a good mood the next morning, so there were no side effects in our case. When an adult in his thirties took one tablet, he felt drowsy after about 20 to 30 minutes. Looking at my smartphone without worrying about it makes me drowsy. When I woke up, I had a slight headache and a feeling that my head was a little vague, so I stopped using it for adults. The taste is a grape flavor of sour Ramune confectionery, close to Kabaya's Juicy C. The aftertaste remains sweet like an artificial sweetener. The hardness is more brittle than ordinary tablets, and it is likely to crumble when exposed to moisture, so you can cut it in half with a kitchen knife or scissors. The size of one tablet is less than 1 cm, so even children will melt if they put it in their mouth. The children seem to like it so much that they ask for more, but since it's a hormone-based supplement, I'm a little worried about long-term use. I'm planning to use it for about a week and fade out at the timing when I'm likely to get into the habit of going to bed early.

Free of the 8 Major Allergens: Peanuts Wheat Eggs Milk Fish Shellfish Tree Nuts Soybeans 7 Tips for Calmness Before Bedtime As a mom, I know every little thing can disrupt even the deepest of sleep ‚Äî travel and jet lag, malaise or anxiety. Our sleep support products, when used intermittently in conjunction with a routine, can help bring a child back to sleep. I've put together a checklist of things to do during the day to help your child calm down before bed. Lots of sunshine and physical activity during the day. Healthy eating (low in sugar), last meal no later than 1-2 hours before bedtime. Warm, soothing bath Quiet conversation, no TV or mobile gadgets Comfort in the bedroom is the key to success: 18-20¬∫C (65-68¬∫F), blackout curtains, white noise generator Plan for waking up in the middle of the night: talk to your child about the plan in case he wakes up Stick to a routine! Good night to you and your baby, Yasmin Kaderali, Mom & CEO Suggested Use Take 30-60 minutes before bedtime, chewing until dissolved. For short term use only. Consult your pediatrician before use. Healthy eating (low in sugar), last meal no later than 1-2 hours before bedtime. Good melatonin. Tablets "Melatonin 1 mg." Melatonin is a hormone that is responsible for the regulation of many biological functions (among them the process of falling asleep and waking). Melatonin contributes to the normalization of natural sleep, adaptation of the body to changes in time zones, slows down the aging processes of the body, ensures the effective functioning of the body's endocrine system, and stimulates the protective functions of the immune system. body systems. It has an antioxidant effect, helps the body fight stress and seasonal depression. Regulates the work of the cardiovascular system and blood pressure, participates in the work of the body's digestive system. Melatonin appears in the human body both naturally - it is produced by the body and comes with some food products. The hormone Melatonin is produced in the body with a varied diet, which necessarily contains carbohydrates, proteins, calcium and vitamin B6. Melatonin is found in its pure form in corn, bananas, tomatoes, rice, carrots, potatoes, fish, figs, parsley, oatmeal, nuts, barley and raisins. With age, the production of the sleep hormone decreases, which leads to sleep disturbances: night awakening, sleep becomes strong, insomnia. It is important to remember that Melatonin does not accumulate in the body - it is impossible to sleep for several days in advance or to stock up on Melatonin. Additional intake of "Melatonin 1 mg" will help regulate and improve sleep, provide an anti-stress effect (improves mood and mental state). Normalizes blood pressure. Slows down aging processes, strengthens immunity. Eliminates some types of headaches.
